parameters.label: Camera
parameters.infoText: Whether to affect the main game camera or the hud camera.

parameters.label: Color
parameters.infoText: The color the camera should be filled with.

parameters.label: Alpha
parameters.infoText: How opaque the fade should be. 255 means it starts/ends fully visible, and 0 means it starts/ends fully invisible.

parameters.label: Duration (Seconds)
parameters.infoText: How long it takes to fade the color in or out.

parameters.label: Fade Out
parameters.infoText: If checked, the fade will start out visible and fade to being invisible. Otherwise, the fade will start invisible and fade to being visible.

parameters.label: Trigger at Start
parameters.infoText: If checked, this event will trigger when the song first loads in instead of triggering where it's placed in the song.
